segments.text: I see a kitchen scene, quite busy, in a line drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The perspective shows a sink and counter along the right wall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman stands at the sink, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely engrossed in her task, polishing with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the sink is overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the front edge in a continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a widening puddle on the floor and cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in the puddle, yet she shows absolutely no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice the deluge at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is truly incredible, how oblivious one can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I fear she might slip and fall in that growing pool of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mess will certainly be substantial if this continues.
segments.speaker: PAR
